channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- Host Agent (SAPOSCOL)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- Host Agent (SAPOSCOL)

item.title: CVE-2023-27498|2023-04-11T20:23:57.030Z -- sap -- host%20agent%20%28saposcol%29
item.description: SAP Host Agent (SAPOSCOL) - version 7.22, allows an unauthenticated attacker with network access to a server port assigned to the SAP Start Service to submit a crafted request which results in a memory corruption error. This error can be used to reveal but not modify any technical information about the server. It can also make a particular service temporarily unavailable
